Questions.Question: Who won the Academy Award for Best Actor in 2020?
Questions.Explanation: Joaquin Phoenix won the Academy Award for Best Actor in 2020 for his role in 'Joker'.

Questions.Question: Which film won the Best Picture Oscar in 2019?
FalseAnswer: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Questions.Explanation: 'Parasite' made history by becoming the first South Korean film to win the Best Picture Oscar in 2019.

Questions.Question: Who directed the movie 'Pulp Fiction'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Pulp Fiction' was directed by Quentin Tarantino, known for his unique storytelling style.

Questions.Question: Which actor played the character Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Questions.Explanation: Robert Downey Jr. portrayed the iconic character Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Questions.Question: Who won the Academy Award for Best Actress in 2020?
Questions.Explanation: Renée Zellweger won the Academy Award for Best Actress in 2020 for her role in 'Judy'.

Questions.Question: Which film won the Best Animated Feature Oscar in 2020?
FalseAnswer: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Questions.Explanation: 'Toy Story 4' won the Best Animated Feature Oscar in 2020, continuing the beloved franchise.

Questions.Question: Who directed the movie 'The Shawshank Redemption'?
Questions.Explanation: 'The Shawshank Redemption' was directed by Frank Darabont, known for his powerful storytelling.

Questions.Question: Which actor played the character Luke Skywalker in the original 'Star Wars' trilogy?
Questions.Explanation: Mark Hamill portrayed the iconic character Luke Skywalker in the original 'Star Wars' trilogy.

Questions.Question: Who won the Academy Award for Best Director in 2020?
Questions.Explanation: Bong Joon-ho won the Academy Award for Best Director in 2020 for his film 'Parasite'.
